peopleAlsoAsk.question: How to find out if old coins are valuable?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Hire a professional appraiser to grade your coins and tell you how much it is worth. The American Society of Appraisers and International Society of Appraisers have searchable directories of professional appraisers. A dealer might also be able to help.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Evaluating Old Coins & Paper Money - Enoch Pratt Free Library

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How much is a 1897 gold coin worth?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: 1897 10 Dollar Gold Coin Value According to the NGC Price Guide, as of April 2025, a 10 Dollar Gold Coin from 1897 in circulated condition is worth between $1665 and $1745. However, on the open market 1897 Gold Eagles in pristine, uncirculated condition sell for as much as $12000.
